title: Randomize PointFields in CdcrBootstrapTest
description:
CdcrBootstrapTest is the sole user of the following 3 config sets...


	src/test-files/solr/configsets/cdcr-source-disabled/conf/schema.xml
	src/test-files/solr/configsets/cdcr-source/conf/schema.xml
	src/test-files/solr/configsets/cdcr-target/conf/schema.xml
